title: Easy Magazine
shortDescription: Engage your visitors with smart business magazines
longDescription:
Add to your website a smart and beautiful business magazine to engage and retain your visitors!   

Easy Magazine brings to your personal Newsroom the relevant high-quality articles, carefully curated from the best online sources, according to your specific criteria. All that is left is to publish them to your magazine or share to social networks.   

With Easy Magazine your visitors will stay at your website longer and come back more often, so  you can dramatically increase your time-on-site, reduce the bounce rate, and improve your search rank as a result.
instructions:
* Install the app in your Cloudflare dashboard
* Create your Filtr8 account by registering [here](https://filtr8.com/join?sccfl=cf)
* Follow instructions to create the content feed for your Filtr8 Newsroom
* Explore the discovered content in your Newsroom and publish selected articles
* Copy your magazine's code using Sidebar -> Magazine -> Settings -> Magazine code in your Newsroom. See  [this image](https://filtr8.com/img/cf_embed_instructions.jpg) for illustration
* Paste your magazine's code into "Magazine code" field in the app's configuration page in your Cloudflare dashboard
* Enjoy it and let us know what do you think. We answer every email and always happy to help!
author: Filtr8 Smartifico Ltd.

products.title: One Magazine Limited
products.shortDescription: One magazine with limited functionality
products.longDescription:
# Add magazine to your website

Engage your visitors and demonstrate your domain expertise with a professional business magazine on your website. 
Publish high-quality articles, highly relevant to your business and interests of your audience.

# Share to social media

Share awesome content to your social networks in a single click. 
Add automatic hashtags for the maximum exposure of your posts.

# Flexible content sources

Publish content brought by our discovery engine, connect RSS feeds of your favorite publications, or simply add any individual article.

products.title: One Magazine Full
products.shortDescription: Full featured with 1 magazine and daily content updates
products.longDescription:
# Add magazine to your website

Engage your visitors and demonstrate your domain expertise with a professional business magazine on your website. 
Publish high-quality articles, highly relevant to your business and interests of your audience.

# Share to social media

Share awesome content to your social networks in a single click. 
Add automatic hashtags for the maximum exposure of your posts.

# Flexible content sources

Publish content brought by our discovery engine, connect RSS feeds of your favorite publications, or simply add any individual article.

# Publish unlimited articles

Publish unlimited articles, so your visitors will stay at your website much longer and will come back more often. Free magazines are limited to 10 published articles only.

# Get daily content updates

We will keep looking daily for the latest and greatest content for your Newsroom, so you will always have a fresh content to share and publish.

# Bring traffic to your site

Share from your Newsroom smart links which will bring visitors back to your website or display your custom Call-to-Action when they click the article you shared.

# Get subscribers and leads

Unlock magazine's subscription form. Your magazine's subscribers will receive email notifications when you publish new content.

# Remove Filtr8 promotions

Remove Filtr8 popups and promotional messages from your magazine and social shares. Customize your own branding and messaging.

# Content research tools

Use advanced content research tools to drill down into specific subjects and explore different perspectives to find intriguing and unexpected content

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

categories.title: Get More Customers
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your customer base.

categories.title: Recommended for Marketing Sites
categories.description: Apps for marketing sites in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

categories.description: Integrate your website with Twitter, Facebook, and other networks.

help.helpvalue:
Register for Filtr8 Newsroom to create the magazine on your own subject. If you are already registered, log in to your account to manage your magazine.

When your magazine is ready, copy its code and paste it into the Magazine code field below. Please see the screenshot for details on obtaining the magazine code from your Newsroom.

magcode.description: Enter magazine code copied from your Newsroom
magcode.title: Magazine code

magwidth.description: Enter magazine width in % of the screen width
magwidth.title: Magazine width

Use advanced content research tools to drill down into specific subjects and explore different perspectives to find intriguing and unexpected content

products.title: Five Magazines
products.shortDescription: Full featured with 5 magazines and daily content updates
products.longDescription:
# Add magazine to your website

Engage your visitors and demonstrate your domain expertise with a professional business magazine on your website. 
Publish high-quality articles, highly relevant to your business and interests of your audience.

# Share to social media

Share awesome content to your social networks in a single click. 
Add automatic hashtags for the maximum exposure of your posts.

# Flexible content sources

Publish content brought by our discovery engine, connect RSS feeds of your favorite publications, or simply add any individual article.

# Publish unlimited articles

Publish unlimited articles, so your visitors will stay at your website much longer and will come back more often. Free magazines are limited to 10 published articles only.

# Get daily content updates

We will keep looking daily for the latest and greatest content for your Newsroom, so you will always have a fresh content to share and publish.

# Bring traffic to your site

Share from your Newsroom smart links which will bring visitors back to your website or display your custom Call-to-Action when they click the article you shared.

# Get subscribers and leads

Unlock magazine's subscription form. Your magazine's subscribers will receive email notifications when you publish new content.

# Remove Filtr8 promotions

Remove Filtr8 popups and promotional messages from your magazine and social shares. Customize your own branding and messaging.

# Content research tools

Use advanced content research tools to drill down into specific subjects and explore different perspectives to find intriguing and unexpected content

help.helpvalue:
Register for Filtr8 Newsroom to create the magazine on your own subject. If you are already registered, log in to your account to manage your magazine.

When your magazine is ready, copy its code and paste it into the Magazine code field below. Please see the screenshot for details on obtaining the magazine code from your Newsroom.

magcode.description: Enter magazine code copied from your Newsroom
magcode.title: Magazine code

magheight.description: Enter magazine height in % of screen size
magheight.title: Magazine height

magwidth.description: Enter magazine width in % of screen size
magwidth.title: Magazine width

proposedApp.title: Easy Magazine
proposedApp.shortDescription: Engage your visitors with smart business magazines
proposedApp.longDescription:
Add to your website a smart and beautiful business magazine to engage and retain your visitors!   

Easy Magazine brings to your personal Newsroom the relevant high-quality articles, carefully curated from the best online sources, according to your specific criteria. All that is left is to publish them to your magazine or share to social networks.   

With Easy Magazine your visitors will stay at your website longer and come back more often, so  you can dramatically increase your time-on-site, reduce the bounce rate, and improve your search rank as a result.
proposedApp.instructions:
* Install the app in your Cloudflare dashboard
* Create your Filtr8 account by registering [here](https://filtr8.com/join?sccfl=cf)
* Follow instructions to create the content feed for your Filtr8 Newsroom
* Explore the discovered content in your Newsroom and publish selected articles
* Copy your magazine's code using Sidebar -> Magazine -> Settings -> Magazine code in your Newsroom. See  [this image](https://filtr8.com/img/cf_embed_instructions.jpg) for illustration
* Paste your magazine's code into "Magazine code" field in the app's configuration page in your Cloudflare dashboard
* Enjoy it and let us know what do you think. We answer every email and always happy to help!
proposedApp.author: Filtr8 Smartifico Ltd.
